GRAND THEFT AUTO ONLINE Discover an ever-evolving world of choices and ways to play as you climb the criminal ranks of Los Santos and Blaine County in the ultimate shared Online experience. Name: The Last of Us Part II Remastered PlayStation 5
product-description: Winner of over 300 Game of the Year awards, remastered for the PlayStation®5 console. Relive or play for the first time Ellie and Abby’s story, now with graphical enhancements, new gameplay modes like the roguelike survival experience Five years after their dangerous journey across the post-pandemic United States, Ellie and Joel have settled down in Jackson, Wyoming. Living amongst a thriving community of survivors has allowed them peace and stability, despite the constant threat of the infected and other, more desperate survivors. When a violent event disrupts that peace, Ellie embarks on a relentless journey to carry out justice and find closure.

Name: Tekken 8 PS5
product-description: TEKKEN 8, the brand-new entry in the legendary TEKKEN franchise, brings the fight to the new generation! Fist Meets Fate! TEKKEN 8 continues the tragic saga of the Mishima bloodline and its world-shaking father-and-son grudge matches. After defeating his father, Heihachi Mishima, Kazuya continues his conquest for global domination, using the forces of G Corporation to wage war on the world. Jin is forced to face his fate head-on as he is reunited with his long-lost mother and seeks to stop his father Kazuya's reign of terror. Experience the next chapter in the longest-running video game storyline with 32 redesigned, unique fighters and master the all-new ‘Heat’ system to crush your opponents. Enjoy high-fidelity graphics, developed for the new generation of hardware, to showcase every moment of impact and aggressive super moves. With a variety of single-player content to explore, such as the brand-new Arcade Quest mode and an in-depth customization system for both playable and avatar characters, TEKKEN 8 introduces the most thrilling experience yet.

Name: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X Desktop Processor, 4.6GHz (Max Boost Clock) & 3.7GHz (Base Clock), 6-Core, AM4, 12 Threads, TSMC 7nm FinFET | 100-100000065TRAY
product-description: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6Cores 12 Threads 4.6GHZ AM4 Processor AMD RYZEN 5600X SIX CORE 4.6GHZ (SOCKET AM4) PROCESSOR - RETAIL |100-100000065BOX, When you have the world’s most advanced processor architecture for gamers and content creators, the possibilities are endless. Whether you are playing the latest games, designing the next skyscraper, or crunching data, you need a powerful processor that can handle it all—and more. Hands down, the AMD RYZEN 5600X Series desktop processors set the bar for gamers and artists alike.AMD RYZEN 5600X Series processors power the next generation of demanding games, providing one of a kind immersive experiences and dominate any multithreaded task like 3D and video rendering2, and software compiling.With great processing power comes the bleeding-edge technologies to support. All AMD Ryzen 5000 Series processors come with a full suite of technologies designed to elevate your PC’s processing power including Precision Boost 2, Precision Boost Overdrive3 and PCIe 4.0.Not only are these processors drop-in ready on 500 series motherboards with a simple BIOS update, you can easily tweak and tune your processor with Ryzen™ Master and AMD Store MI.

Intel Core i3-10100 up to 4.3 GHz Quad-Core LGA 1200 Processor, 14 nm Processor, 6 MB Cache
product-description: The Core i3-10100 3.6 GHz Quad-Core LGA 1200 Processor from Intel has a base clock speed of 3.6 GHz and comes with features such as Intel Optane Memory support, Intel Boot Guard, Intel VT-d virtualization technology for directed I/O, and Intel Hyper-Threading technology. With Intel Turbo Boost 2.0, the maximum turbo frequency this processor can achieve is 4.3 GHz. Additionally. This processor features 4 cores with 8 threads in an LGA 1200 socket, has 6MB of cache memory, and 16 PCIe lanes. Having 4 cores allows the processor to run multiple programs simultaneously without slowing down the system, while the 8 threads allow a basic ordered sequence of instructions to be passed through or processed by a single CPU core. This processor also supports 128GB of dual-channel 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM and utilizes 10th-generation technology. Graphically, the Core i3-10100 uses the integrated Intel UHD Graphics 630 chipset, which has a base frequency of 350 MHz and a dynamic frequency of 1.1 GHz. A thermal solution is included. Built using a Hybrid Core  architecture with the Intel 7 process, this 12th generation desktop processor's 10 cores combine the performance of four Efficient-cores and six 3.7 GHz Performance-cores. Name: Intel Core i7-12700 12 Core Alder Lake CPU/Processor, 2.1GHz, 25MB Cache, Socket LGA 1700, 20 Total Threads, 65W Base Power, | i7-12700
product-description: Take on more, with more performance Blazing-fast clock speeds and a revolutionary core architecture allow you to seamlessly chat, stream and record without sacrificing gameplay. Divide and conquer Intel’s new performance hybrid architecture integrates two core families into a single CPU, keeping everything in your gaming universe running smoothly. Intel Thread Director Prioritizes and manages workloads, sending tasks to the best core for the job. 8 Performance-cores P-cores are built for performance across single and lightly-threaded workloads, enhancing activities like gaming and productivity. 4 Efficient-cores E-cores are optimized for multi-threaded performance, minimizing interruptions from secondary tasks. Performance beyond the cores The new processor architecture is also compatible with the latest platform innovations, giving you performance improvements throughout your PC. Ready for what's next Support for PCIe Gen 5 and DDR5 for high-performance components like memory and graphics. Best-in-class connectivity Thunderbolt 4 and Intel Killer Wi-Fi 6/6E (Gig+) deliver fast transfer speeds and connections to peripherals.

product-description: Intel Core i9-13900K Gen 3.3 GHz Quad-Core LGA 1700 Processor  Description Power up your productivity, gaming, and content creation with the Intel Core i9-13900K 3 GHz 24-Core LGA 1700 Processor. This 13th generation desktop processor builds upon the Hybrid Core architecture and Intel 7 process by fitting 24 cores— eight more than the previous generation— onto a single processor while still fitting the LGA 1700 socket. Designed to provide exceptional performance, the Core i9-13900K features 16 low-voltage Efficient-cores that handle background tasks for multitasking while the eight 3 GHz Performance-cores provide speed for demanding applications and games. The built-in Intel Thread Director ensures that the two work seamlessly together by dynamically and intelligently assigning workloads to the right core at the right time.  Specifications

Name: ASUS TUF GAMING B650-PLUS WIFI ATX AM5 Motherboard, AMD B650 Chipset, DDR5, PCIe 5.0, WiFi 6, Aura Sync RGB | 90MB1A00-M0EAY0
product-description: The ASUS TUF Gaming B650-PLUS WIFI motherboard combines military-grade durability with next-gen performance for AMD Ryzen 7000-series processors on the AM5 socket. Engineered for long-term stability and high-efficiency power delivery, it features a robust 12 + 2 DrMOS VRM design, enlarged VRM heatsinks, and premium capacitors for sustained gaming and creative workloads. Supporting DDR5 memory, PCIe 5.0 x16 graphics, and M.2 PCIe 4.0 storage, this board ensures lightning-fast data transfer for demanding users. Integrated WiFi 6 and 2.5 Gb Ethernet provide ultra-reliable connectivity, while ASUS AI Noise-Canceling Microphone and Realtek S1200A audio deliver crystal-clear sound. Its reinforced PCIe SafeSlot, military-grade components, and ESD Guards ensure exceptional reliability. The TUF Gaming Alliance ecosystem further enhances compatibility across trusted PC components. With ASUS Armoury Crate for lighting control and driver management, the TUF B650-PLUS WIFI is a rock-solid foundation for powerful gaming rigs and professional PC builds.  Available on ArabGamers.aeFree delivery on orders over 1000AED (UAE only)Payment options: Cash on Delivery and Card Payment Includes 1-Year Warranty Contact: +971 55 390 2843

Name: Biostar H510MHP 2.0 Ver. 6.0 LGA 1200 Micro-ATX Intel Motherboard, Intel H510 Chipset
product-description: The BIOSTAR H510MHP 2.0 Ver. 6.0 is a Micro-ATX format motherboard leveraging the Intel H510 chipset and LGA 1200 socket, enabling support for 10th and 11th generation Intel Core, Pentium and Celeron processors. With dual DDR4 DIMM slots capable of accommodating up to 64 GB of memory and speeds up to 3200 MHz, it offers solid upgrade potential for compact or value-oriented systems. Storage flexibility is built-in via one M.2 socket supporting PCIe 3.0×4 and SATA SSDs, alongside four SATA III ports for more traditional drives. Expansion options include a full-length PCIe 3.0/4.0 x16 slot and two PCIe 3.0 x1 slots, while the rear I/O delivers HDMI, VGA, PS/2 ports, USB 3.2 Gen1, USB 2.0, and Gigabit LAN via Intel I219V controller. Its compact size (approximately 18.5 cm × 22.6 cm) makes it suitable for space-constrained builds, yet it retains the essential connectivity and performance features needed for a gaming, home office or mainstream PC build in the UAE. Available on ArabGamers.aeFree delivery on orders over 1000AED (UAE only)Payment options: Cash on Delivery and Card Payment Includes 1-Year Warranty Contact: +971 55 390 2843

Name: ASUS Prime B650M-R AMD Socket AM5 Gaming Motherboard, DDR5, PCIe 4.0 Support, Black | 90MB1H30-M0EAY0
product-description: Meet ASUS PRIME B650M-R, a micro-ATX Gaming motherboard built for AMD AM5 platform. Designed for performance, versatility, and future upgrades, it’s ideal for gamers, creators, and power users. Bringing together cutting-edge features like DDR5 support, PCIe 4.0 bandwidth, dual M.2 slots, 2.5 Gb Ethernet, BIOS FlashBack, and ASUS’s reliability enhancements, the PRIME B650M-R offers a high-value foundation for building a modern PC rig. Support for fast DDR5 memory and PCIe 4.0 ensures high throughput for graphics and storage, making it ideal in mid-to-high tier gaming PCs. Dual M.2 SSDs and 2.5Gb Ethernet provide fast data transfer for media workloads. With the AM5 socket and B650 chipset, the board supports next-gen Ryzen CPUs. Its micro-ATX size fits many smaller PC cases without sacrificing essential features. ASUS protection features help guard against overcurrent, voltage fluctuations, and physical damage to slots. BIOS FlashBack lets users update BIOS without a CPU installed a useful feature for preemptively updating support. Addressable RGB lighting via Aura Sync lets enthusiasts integrate the board visually into more elaborate setups.  Available on ArabGamers.aeFree delivery on orders over 1000AED (UAE only)Payment options: Cash on Delivery and Card Payment Includes 1-Year Warranty Contact: +971 55 390 2843

Name: Asus Prime H610M-D D4 Intel® H610 (LGA 1700) mic-ATX
product-description: - FLEXIBILITYComprehensive controls form the foundation of the ASUS Prime series. The Prime H610 motherboard packs flexible tools to tune every aspect of your system, enabling performance tweaks to perfectly match the way you work to maximize productivity. All-Around Energy EfficiencyThe Energy Processing Unit (EPU) automatically optimizes power consumption and maximizes energy savings with Away mode — a smart setting that creates an extreme energy-saving scenario by shutting down unused I/O controllers. UEFI BIOSThe renowned ASUS UEFI BIOS provides everything you need to configure, tweak and tune your system. It offers intelligently simplified options for PC DIY beginners, as well as comprehensive features for seasoned veterans. Advanced Tuning for Serious TweakersAn intuitive Advanced mode offered via the UEFI lets you take complete control. A built-in search feature makes it easy to find options, and various advanced functions let you intelligently make nuanced adjustments so you can dial in performance just the way you want. COOLINGPrime H610 series are engineered with heatsink and an array of hybrid fan headers to ensure your rig stays cool and stable under intense workloads. Cooler by DesignPrime H610 series feature comprehensive cooling controls that are configurable via Fan Xpert 2+ software or via the UEFI BIOS. Multiple Temperature SourcesEach header can dynamically reference three thermal sensors. Fan Xpert 2+ allows you to map the temperature of supported ASUS graphics cards to optimize cooling for GPU- and CPU-intensive tasks. PERFORMANCEPrime H610 series are built to handle the additional cores and increased bandwidth of 12th Generation Intel® processors. ASUS H610 motherboards provide all the fundamentals to boost daily productivity, so your system will be ready for action with stable power, intuitive cooling and flexible transfer options. PCIe® 4.0Prime H610 motherboards are designed specifically for 12th Generation Intel® Core™ CPUs and offer PCIe® 4.0 connectivity for the latest GPUs. The wide bandwidth and superfast transmission speeds allow you to create feature-rich builds that can handle high loads effortlessly.

Name: Asus Prime Gaming Motherboard Z890-P DDR5 Intel® Z890 (LGA 1851) M-ATX With WIFI-6 Support
product-description: The ASUS PRIME Z890-P motherboard is a robust, feature-rich ATX board built on the Intel Z890 chipset, designed for power users, gamers, and professionals in the UAE. Supporting the latest Intel Core Ultra processors, it delivers the performance, cooling, and stability required for modern computing, gaming, and overclocking. With Intel Turbo Boost Technology 3.0, the PRIME Z890-P dynamically adjusts CPU frequency for maximum speed. Optimized for the Intel Core Ultra series, it ensures smooth performance across gaming, streaming, content creation, and overclocking workloads. This motherboard supports up to 192GB DDR5 memory, with speeds reaching 8666+ MT/s (OC) perfect for video editing, 3D rendering, and high-end gaming PCs in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and Sharjah. The dual-channel architecture, paired with ASUS Enhanced Memory Profile III (AEMP III), automatically fine-tunes memory for stability and speed. The ASUS PRIME Z890-P is engineered for efficient cooling. Multiple heatsinks, hybrid fan headers, and integrated thermal sensors ensure system reliability. With Fan Xpert 4 software, UAE users can easily customize cooling profiles for gaming marathons or workstation tasks. Equipped with four M.2 slots and four SATA 6Gb/s ports, this board supports high-speed storage expansion. One PCIe 5.0 M.2 slot delivers up to 128Gbps transfer speeds, eliminating bottlenecks for gaming rigs and editing systems. A USB 20Gbps Type-C port with DisplayPort support adds flexibility for the latest high-speed peripherals. For connectivity, the Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet port ensures ultra-fast wired networking ideal for online gaming and heavy data transfers in UAE environments. ASUS LANGuard technology enhances surge protection and connection stability. The PRIME Z890-P offers personalization with ASUS Aura Sync RGB, giving builders in the Middle East full lighting control. Its UEFI BIOS offers easy and advanced tuning, while ASUS Armoury Crate centralizes device management across ASUS components. Designed with PC builders in mind, the motherboard includes Q-DIMM slots, M.2 Q-Latch, and pre-mounted I/O shields for quick installation. ProCool connectors, VRM heatsinks, and premium components ensure stability even with power-hungry CPUs and GPUs. The ASUS PRIME Z890-P ATX motherboard is a future-proof Intel Z890 solution that supports Intel Core Ultra CPUs, DDR5 RAM up to 192GB, PCIe 5.0 storage, advanced cooling, and 2.5Gb LAN connectivity. Whether you’re building a gaming PC in Dubai, a workstation in Abu Dhabi, or a high-performance setup in Sharjah, this board delivers cutting-edge performance, stability, and customization.  Available on ArabGamers.aeFree delivery on orders over 1000AED (UAE only)Payment options: Cash on Delivery and Card Payment Includes 1-Year Warranty Contact: +971 55 390 2843

✅ Graphics: 1 x DisplayPort 1 x HDMITM port 1 x USB 20Gbps port (USB Type-C®) supports DisplayPort video output
✅ Expansion Slots: 1 x PCIe 5.0 x16 slot Intel® Z890 Chipset 2 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slots (support x4 mode) 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slot (supports x1 mode)
✅ Ethernet: 1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet
✅ Form Factor: mATX Form Factor 12 inch x 9.6 inch ( 30.5 cm x 24.4 cm )
✅ FLEXIBILITY: Comprehensive controls form the foundation of the ASUS Prime series. The Prime Z890 motherboard packs flexible tools to tune every aspect of your system, enabling performance tweaks to perfectly match the way you work to maximize productivity.
✅ All-Around Energy Efficiency: The Energy Processing Unit (EPU) automatically optimizes power consumption and maximizes energy savings with Away mode — a smart setting that creates an extreme energy-saving scenario by shutting down unused I/O controllers.
✅ UEFI BIOS: The renowned ASUS UEFI BIOS provides everything you need to configure, tweak and tune your system. It offers intelligently simplified options for PC DIY beginners, as well as comprehensive features for seasoned veterans.
✅ Advanced Tuning for Serious Tweakers: An intuitive Advanced mode offered via the UEFI lets you take complete control. A built-in search feature makes it easy to find options, and various advanced functions let you intelligently make nuanced adjustments so you can dial in performance just the way you want.
✅ COOLING: Prime Z890 series are engineered with heatsink and an array of hybrid fan headers to ensure your rig stays cool and stable under intense workloads.
✅ Cooler by Design: Prime Z890 series feature comprehensive cooling controls that are configurable via Fan Xpert 2+ software or via the UEFI BIOS.
✅ Multiple Temperature Sources: Each header can dynamically reference three thermal sensors. Fan Xpert 2+ allows you to map the temperature of supported ASUS graphics cards to optimize cooling for GPU- and CPU-intensive tasks.
✅ PERFORMANCE: Prime Z890 series are built to handle the additional cores and increased bandwidth. ASUS Z890 motherboards provide all the fundamentals to boost daily productivity, so your system will be ready for action with stable power, intuitive cooling and flexible transfer options.

Powered by NVIDIA's latest Blackwell architecture, it features 12GB of ultra-fast GDDR7 memory and supports DLSS 4 for enhanced AI-driven graphics rendering. With a boost clock of 2512 MHz and a 192-bit memory interface, this card delivers smooth and immersive gaming experiences at high resolutions. Name: Zotac GAMING GeForce RTX 3050 Twin Edge 8GB Graphics Card
product-description: Get Amplified with the ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX™ 30 Series based on the NVIDIA Ampere architecture. Built with enhanced RT Cores and Tensor Cores, new streaming multiprocessors, and high-speed GDDR6 memory, the ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 3050 Twin Edge gives rise to amplified gaming. Specifications  ULTIMATE RAY TRACING AND AINVIDIA RTX is the most advanced platform for ray tracing and AI technologies that are revolutionizing the ways we play and create. Over 150 top games and applications use RTX to deliver realistic graphics with incredibly fast performance or cutting-edge new AI features like NVIDIA DLSS and NVIDIA Broadcast. RTX is the new standard. ADVANCED COOLINGA more refined IceStorm 2.0 cooling system is purpose-built for wider coverage to keep the GPU cooler and running stronger, with enhancements in the visible and in what lies underneath. MORE RESILIENTThe design underlines durability with a wraparound metal backplate to increase the overall card rigidity. LED LITThe neutral white LED logo lighting on the graphics card will pair with any system it goes into. TAKE CONTROLWith a simple and intuitive minimal interface, the ZOTAC GAMING FireStorm Utility provides simple tools to transform fine-tuning your GPU into a simple task. Monitor your GPU, control the fan speed, and many more options.

Name: ASUS Prime GeForce RTX 5080 OC Edition with 16GB GDDR7 Graphics Card, 2655 MHz Boost Clock, 256‑bit, 10,752 CUDA Cores, 30 Gbps Memory Clock, 1×HDMI 2.1b, 3×DisplayPort 2.1, AI Performance, PCIe 5.0
product-description: The ASUS Prime GeForce RTX 5080 OC Edition 16GB GDDR7 is built on NVIDIA’s next-gen Blackwell architecture, delivering exceptional power for gaming, content creation, and AI workloads. With 10,752 CUDA cores, a 256-bit memory bus, and 16GB of ultra-fast GDDR7 memory, this card is engineered for high-frame-rate 4K and even 8K gaming. ASUS equips the Prime RTX 5080 with a triple Axial-tech fan design, vapor chamber cooling, and phase-change thermal pads to keep temperatures low and performance consistent, even under heavy load. It supports PCIe 5.0, DisplayPort 2.1, and HDMI 2.1b, ensuring future-proof connectivity for next-gen monitors. This 2.5-slot GPU balances performance, cooling, and quiet acoustics, making it ideal for gamers, creators, and professionals in Dubai and across the UAE. Backed by a 3-year ASUS warranty and available with flexible payments through Tabby & Tamara, it’s a smart choice for anyone upgrading to serious performance. With a 23.8-inch Full HD IPS display, a smooth 120Hz refresh rate, and advanced features like 1ms Motion Blur Reduction, HDR10, and Dynamic Action Sync, this monitor is built for professionals, creators, and gamers alike. Name: Lenovo ThinkPad Universal USB-C Dock,
product-description: ✅ Display Capabilities: Supports up to three monitors, including two at 60Hz (up to 3840 x 2160) and one at 30Hz for UHD resolution, making multitasking and presentations seamless. ✅ Ports and Connectivity: Includes 2x DisplayPort, 1x HDMI, 3x USB 3.1, 2x USB 2.0, and 1x USB-C for flexible peripheral connections. The Gigabit Ethernet port ensures fast and reliable wired network access. ✅ Power and Charging: Equipped with a DC-IN port, the dock provides 65W of output with a 90W power adapter and 100W when using the 135W adapter. It also supports charging through USB-C. ✅ Network and Management Features: Advanced features include PXE boot, Wake-on-LAN, and the ability to pass through ThinkPad MAC addresses for improved network management. ✅ Convenience and Security: The dock offers a power button for easy system on/off control, and a security lock slot for added physical security.
features:
✅ Display Capabilities: Supports up to three monitors, including two at 60Hz (up to 3840 x 2160) and one at 30Hz for UHD resolution, making multitasking and presentations seamless.
✅ Ports and Connectivity: Includes 2x DisplayPort, 1x HDMI, 3x USB 3.1, 2x USB 2.0, and 1x USB-C for flexible peripheral connections. The Gigabit Ethernet port ensures fast and reliable wired network access.
